about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Every legal challenge is an opportunity to find a solution. If you're looking for a skilled and dedicated attorney who will provide expert guidance with empathy and understanding, you're in the right place.

I graduated from the Faculty of Law at Babeș-Bolyai University in Cluj-Napoca in 2010. I obtained my Master’s in Community Private Law in 2011 through a joint program between the University of Pécs and Babeș-Bolyai University.
Since 2013, I have been practicing law as a member of the Sălaj Bar Association, successfully representing my clients.

My passion for the law and commitment to my clients have allowed me to handle numerous successful cases, building trust through professionalism and personalized attention. I believe solving legal issues requires not only expertise but also empathy and a tailored approach.
about.closing: Together, we will find the best solution to your legal problem!

items.title: Family Law
mainPoints: Divorce and ancillary requests
Determination of the child's residence, maintenance allowance, and visitation schedule
Protection orders and establishing or denying paternity of the child

items.title: Commercial Law
mainPoints: Legal consultancy and assistance in negotiating and concluding contracts
Enforcement proceedings, insolvency
Payment summons and orders

items.title: Inheritance and Property Law
mainPoints: Managing inheritance procedures, partition
Land disputes, land registry, and cadastral services
Claims for recovery of property and boundary disputes

items.title: Contravention Law
mainPoints: Drafting and supporting contravention complaints against contravention reports issued, for example, by IPJ, ITM, ANAF, ANPC, etc.

items.title: Insurance Law
mainPoints: Protection and enforcement of insurance rights (RCA, CASCO)
Representation and legal consultancy in insurance disputes

items.title: Criminal Law
mainPoints: Drafting criminal complaints
Assistance and representation in criminal proceedings

items.title: Labor Law
mainPoints: Assistance and representation of employees before employers
Challenges to dismissal decisions
Challenges to retirement decisions

items.title: Administrative Law
mainPoints: Legal representation before public authorities and institutions
Challenges to administrative decisions
Litigation before administrative courts

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some common questions that might help you better understand our legal services.

items.question: What is the cost of an initial consultation?
items.answer: The initial consultation is free. During this meeting, I will review your case, discuss potential next steps, and provide an estimate of any costs involved.

items.question: What languages do you speak?
items.answer: I am fluent in Romanian, Hungarian, and English, and offer comprehensive legal services in these languages throughout Romania.

items.question: Do you take cases in other counties?
items.answer: I primarily handle cases in Sălaj County and nearby areas.

items.question: How can I contact you for legal advice?
items.answer: You can reach me via phone, email, or by using the contact form on the website.

items.question: What documents should I bring to the initial consultation?
items.answer: Please bring all relevant documents such as contracts, correspondence, official notices, or any other evidence related to your case.

items.question: Do you offer court representation?
items.answer: Yes, I provide legal representation in civil, criminal, and administrative matters.

items.question: Do you help with contract drafting and review?
items.answer: Yes, I assist with drafting, modifying, and reviewing contracts to ensure your interests are protected.

items.question: Do you provide legal services for companies?
items.answer: Yes, I offer services like drafting commercial contracts, legal representation, and debt recovery for businesses.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: Our website uses Google Analytics to analyze visitor traffic. This only collects non-personal data, such as visit duration, pages viewed, and device type. Personal information provided through the contact form (name, email address) is used exclusively for communication with you.

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. These include strictly necessary cookies for website functionality and analytical cookies for Google Analytics services.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: The collected data is used exclusively for analyzing website performance and improving our services. We do not share your personal information with third parties.

gdprRights.title: GDPR Rights
gdprRights.content: Under the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and port your data, as well as object to data processing. You can exercise these rights through the contact information provided.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the protection of your personal data. Data is stored on secure servers and we regularly review our security protocols.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Personal data submitted through the contact form for inquiries that do not convert into active cases will be deleted after 6 months. For active cases, data is retained for 5 years after case closure. Non-personal data collected by Google Analytics is retained for 26 months.
